start: You may use the inputs 'N' to start a new game. 'Q' to quit game.
defaultError: Not a valid command, use go, explore, or get.
twoError: we need more than one word.
keyNeeded: You need the key in the warehouse desk to open this
thermosNeeded: You need something to put coffee in, grab your thermos from your locker
passportError: You cross the international border without passport. You were not able to return back. GAME OVER!!!!!
oceanError: Do you think you are an Aquaman?? You just sank your truck and yourself in the ocean. You are dead. START OVER AGAIN!!!!
successPickUp: You have successfully picked up your load, proceed to delivery location
pickUpLocationError: You are not in your pickup location, type 'h' and select option 4 to confirm pickup location
deliverySuccess: You have successfully delivered your load, go back to the office!
missingLoadError: You need to go back to your pickup location and pickup your load.
deliveryLocationError: You are not in your delivery location, type 'h' and select option 4 to confirm delivery location
enterCommand: Enter command, or type 'h' for help options >>>
invalidCommand: Not a valid command! Please try the command again or type 'h' for help and to see list of valid commands
onYourWay: Congrats you are on your way!!!!
drivingItemsNeed: You cannot start driving you still need to find:
noTruckError: You must be at the truck to start driving
